article_title: As consequences of Homeland Security shutdown become clearer, Congress looks to deal

article_metadata.description: WASHINGTON — Congress is three days away from a crisis and we’re firmly in the “rhetoric and dire warnings” phase that comes before any potential resolution.

og.description: Congress has three days left to fund the department tasked with anti-terrorism operations, border control and disaster recovery.
og.title: As consequences of Homeland Security shutdown become clearer, Congress looks to deal

article_metadata.keywords: Barack Obama,Congress,Nation,Washington Bureau,Politics,Al Franken,Al-Shabab,Amy Klobuchar,Betty McCollum,Department of Homeland Security,Mall of America
